channel.title: Learning on QY's Notes

item.title: Notes on The Collector’s Fallacy
item.description: Notes on: The Collector’s Fallacy • Zettelkasten Method Collector’s Fallacy Hoarding information, such as making copies and bookmarking webpages, can be addictive, because we have instant feedback: we did something, and the collection volumn increases. However, apart from the plies of collection, actually we haven’t learned a thing. What to do instead We need to assimilate the information and increase our own knowledge, and one of the first steps is to take notes.
